name: Learner Driver AR Companion App
description:
This is an app designed to work in conjunction with QLD's "Your Keys To Driving" booklet for learner driver test preparation. The concept behind the AR app was to develop an app with real-world applications.

It was developed as a concept piece for an elective module while studying at SAE Institute Brisbane - December 2021 

How To Use The App:

Download the Tracking Images, or go to Your keys to driving in Queensland—complete booklet and download the pdf.

The app is designed to work with the driving diagrams within this booklet.
